abstract: Profile of Dr Patrick H Conway, chief medical officer of Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services; Conway not only serves as second-highest official in agency that oversees programs spending nearly $1 trillion a year on American health care, but is pediatrician who also treats patients and trains young doctors.
lead_paragraph: Dr. Patrick H. Conway, chief medical officer at the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services, keeps one foot on the front lines as he works to improve the health system.

headline.main: Shaping Health Policy for Millions, and Still Treating Some on the Side
headline.print_headline: Shaping Health Policy, While Practicing on the Side

snippet: Dr. Patrick H. Conway, chief medical officer at the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services, keeps one foot on the front lines as he works to improve the health system.
